item.title: Jason Mraz - I Won't Give Up
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Won't Give Up - Jason Mraz
Using the chords: A Bm7 C C# D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU or D DU U (or a combination of both)
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered (1 tone) to make it more suitable for the ukulele
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Youngbloods - Get Together
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G F C D
Get Together by The Youngbloods. It’s been digitally lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video was created by YouTuber “Chris' Lyrics” and I simply added the chords to their video.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Bryan Adams - Summer Of '69
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Summer Of '69 - Bryan Adams
Using the chords: A Bb Bm C D F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU or D DU U DU but try your own out too!
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: OneRepublic - Rescue Me (Acoustic)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm. In the original key.
Chords Used: Bm, A, D, G
As performed by OneRepublic. This was a request from my own two boys, age 7 & 10. If you read this comments, they would be thrilled if you watched some of their videos and followed them.
Older son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnXyBzSlqfs_N0Sz8EeTj7Q Younger son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLCD1tFgLd6rgT1WzdR4paA
And if you are reading all of this, please follow my other ukulele channel: https://www.youtube.com/ukestuff As these videos cannot be monetized, subscriptions and views on the other channel really will help me out.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JZA5jnT4brY
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Beyoncé - SPIRIT (From Disney's "The Lion King")
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G D Em C B7 Am F
Spirit (from Disney’s The Lion King) by Beyoncé. It’s been raised by 2 semitones and the modulation has been removed so beginner ukulele students can play along. Also, the “quick change” chords have not been included. As for the B7 chord, feel free to do it 432X instead of using the barre.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music (Non-US)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Avril Lavigne - Complicated
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, Em, C, D, Am
As performed by Avril Lavigne.
This video was originally blocked everywhere by the copyright holder. The copyright holder has now allowed this use of the song, so I can make this video available. Recorded in May 2019, published in July 2019.
Tutorial Video (GCEA Chords & Strumming): https://youtu.be/7sP-4H11k0g
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Tim McGraw - Live Like You Were Dying
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: The first two verses are in the key of G and uses G, C, Em, D, and 1 B7. The third verse is in the key of A and uses A, D, Gbm, E, and 1 C#.
Live Like You Were Dying by Tim McGraw. It’s the official lyric video, I just added the ukulele chords.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Daniel Powter - Bad Day
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C, Fadd2, G, Am, F, G+, D
So You Had A Bad Day by Daniel Powter. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. Also, the bridge has been removed to help simplify it. While I created this for ukulele, any instrument that plays chords would use it (guitar, keyboard, etc.).
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Eric Clapton - Tears in Heaven
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: F, C, Dm Bb, A, Gm, Cm, D, C7
Tears in Heaven by Eric Clapton. This version does not have the bridge. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones to the key of C so beginner ukulele students can play along. Some of the more complex chords have been simplified or skipped.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
